lda i01         00, 01
add i01         0c, 01

[0x00, 0x01, 0x0c, 0x01]

lda i01         00, 01
sta @0800       28, 00, 08
ldx @0800       05, 00, 08

[
  0b00000000,
  0b00000001,
  0b00101000,
  0b00000000,
  0b00001000,
  0b00000101,
  0b00000000,
  0b00001000
]
[
  0b00000100
  0b10000000
]

output port a code test 4
lda #$ff
sta $fef3
lda #$64
sta $fef1

[
  0b00000000,
  0b11111111,
  0b00101000,
  0b11110011,
  0b11111110,
  0b00000000,
  0b01100100,
  0b00101000,
  0b11110001,
  0b11111110
]
